statements: SELECT * FROM medication_inventory;
SELECT medication_id, medication_name FROM medication_inventory;
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM medication_inventory WHERE expiration_date > '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM medication_inventory ORDER BY expiration_date DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM medication_inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM medication_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM medication_inventory WHERE expiration_date >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY medication_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM medication_inventory WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31' AND quantity < 5;
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM medication_inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY quantity DESC, medication_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_medications, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM medication_inventory;
SELECT * FROM medication_inventory;
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM medication_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT medication_name FROM medication_inventory ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_prescriptions WHERE prescription_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM medication_inventory WHERE medication_id = '3d39620f-1bce-4c5b-a121-b76149b1ee73';
SELECT * FROM medication_inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM medication_inventory WHERE expiration_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM medication_inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY medication_name ASC;

SELECT p.prescription_id, m.medication_name, pp.prescription_date FROM patient_prescriptions pp JOIN medication_inventory m ON pp.medication_id = m.medication_id JOIN patient_prescriptions p ON pp.prescription_id = p.prescription_id WHERE p.patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT p.patient_id, COUNT(*) AS total_prescriptions FROM patient_prescriptions p GROUP BY p.patient_id HAVING total_prescriptions >= 3 ORDER BY total_prescriptions DESC;
SELECT * FROM medication_inventory;
SELECT medication_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM medication_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM medication_inventory ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, prescription_date, quantity FROM patient_prescriptions WHERE quantity >= 10;
SELECT medication_name, quantity FROM medication_inventory WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, address, phone_number FROM patients ORDER BY phone_number DESC;
SELECT prescription_id, patient_id, medication_id, prescription_date, quantity FROM patient_prescriptions WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM medication_inventory JOIN patient_prescriptions ON medication_inventory.medication_id = patient_prescriptions.medication_id WHERE medication_inventory.quantity > 0;
SELECT medication_name, expiration_date FROM medication_inventory WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01' AND quantity > 5 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Medications;
SELECT name, quantity FROM Medications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT p.name AS patient_name, m.name AS medication_name, pr.dosage FROM Patients p JOIN Prescriptions pr ON p.id = pr.patient_id JOIN Medications m ON pr.medication_id = m.id;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Pharmacy' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT name, quantity, expiration_date FROM Medications WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY name;

SELECT p.name AS patient_name, m.name AS medication_name, i.quantity AS inventory_quantity FROM Patients p JOIN Prescriptions pr ON p.id = pr.patient_id JOIN Medications m ON m.id = pr.medication_id JOIN Inventory i ON m.id = i.medication_id WHERE i.quantity > 0;
SELECT DISTINCT name, address, phone_number FROM Patients ORDER BY address;

SELECT pr.id AS prescription_id, m.name AS medication_name, p.name AS patient_name, pr.prescribed_date, pr.dosage FROM Prescriptions pr JOIN Medications m ON pr.medication_id = m.id JOIN Patients p ON pr.patient_id = p.id ORDER BY pr.prescribed_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Medications;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM Medications WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT patient_id, name, address FROM Patients ORDER BY address ASC;
SELECT prescription_id, medication_id, quantity, prescription_date FROM Prescriptions WHERE quantity >= 10;
SELECT medication_id, quantity, DATE_FORMAT(last_updated, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS last_updated FROM Inventory ORDER BY medication_id DESC;
SELECT id, name, quantity, expiration_date FROM Medications WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE name LIKE 'J%' AND address LIKE '%Street';

SELECT p.name AS patient_name, m.name AS medication_name, pr.quantity AS prescription_quantity FROM Patients p JOIN Prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id JOIN Medications m ON pr.medication_id = m.id;
SELECT medication_id, quantity, last_updated FROM Inventory WHERE last_updated > '2021-10-01';
SELECT e.expiration_id, m.name AS medication_name, e.expiration_date FROM Expirations e JOIN Medications m ON e.medication_id = m.id ORDER BY e.expiration_date ASC LIMIT 5;
